00016 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017 // Defines and macros 
00018 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00019 #define EVENT_BUTTON_CLICKED                0x0101
00020 #define EVENT_COMBOBOX_SELECTION_CHANGED    0x0201
00021 #define EVENT_RADIOBUTTON_CHANGED           0x0301
00022 #define EVENT_CHECKBOX_CHANGED              0x0401
00023 #define EVENT_SLIDER_VALUE_CHANGED          0x0501
00024 #define EVENT_EDITBOX_STRING                0x0601
00025 // EVENT_EDITBOX_CHANGE is sent when the listbox content changes
00026 // due to user input.
00027 #define EVENT_EDITBOX_CHANGE                0x0602
00028 #define EVENT_LISTBOX_ITEM_DBLCLK           0x0701
00029 // EVENT_LISTBOX_SELECTION is fired off when the selection changes in
00030 // a single selection list box.
00031 #define EVENT_LISTBOX_SELECTION             0x0702
00032

00059 enum DXUT_CONTROL_TYPE 
00060 { 
00061     DXUT_CONTROL_BUTTON, 
00062     DXUT_CONTROL_STATIC, 
00063     DXUT_CONTROL_CHECKBOX,
00064     DXUT_CONTROL_RADIOBUTTON,
00065     DXUT_CONTROL_COMBOBOX,
00066     DXUT_CONTROL_SLIDER,
00067     DXUT_CONTROL_EDITBOX,
00068     DXUT_CONTROL_IMEEDITBOX,
00069     DXUT_CONTROL_LISTBOX,
00070     DXUT_CONTROL_SCROLLBAR,
00071 };
00072 
00073 enum DXUT_CONTROL_STATE
00074 {
00075     DXUT_STATE_NORMAL = 0,
00076     DXUT_STATE_DISABLED,
00077     DXUT_STATE_HIDDEN,
00078     DXUT_STATE_FOCUS,
00079     DXUT_STATE_MOUSEOVER,
00080     DXUT_STATE_PRESSED,
00081 };
00082 
00083 #define MAX_CONTROL_STATES 6
00084 
00085 struct DXUTBlendColor
00086 {
00087     void Init( D3DCOLOR defaultColor, D3DCOLOR disabledColor = D3DCOLOR_ARGB(200, 128, 128, 128), D3DCOLOR hiddenColor = 0 );
00088     void Blend( UINT iState, float fElapsedTime, float fRate = 0.7f );
00089     
00090     D3DCOLOR  States[ MAX_CONTROL_STATES ]; // Modulate colors for all possible control states
00091     D3DXCOLOR Current;
00092 };

00095 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 // Contains all the display tweakables for a sub-control
00097 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 class CDXUTElement
00099 {
00100 public:
00101     void SetTexture( UINT iTexture, RECT* prcTexture, D3DCOLOR defaultTextureColor = D3DCOLOR_ARGB(255, 255, 255, 255) );
00102     void SetFont( UINT iFont, D3DCOLOR defaultFontColor = D3DCOLOR_ARGB(255, 255, 255, 255), DWORD dwTextFormat = DT_CENTER | DT_VCENTER );
00103     
00104     void Refresh();
00105     
00106     UINT iTexture;          // Index of the texture for this Element 
00107     UINT iFont;             // Index of the font for this Element
00108     DWORD dwTextFormat;     // The format argument to DrawText 
00109 
00110     RECT rcTexture;         // Bounding rect of this element on the composite texture
00111     
00112     DXUTBlendColor TextureColor;
00113     DXUTBlendColor FontColor;
00114 };

00356 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00357 // Base class for controls
00358 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00359 class CDXUTControl
00360 {
00361 public:
00362     CDXUTControl( CDXUTDialog *pDialog = NULL );
00363     virtual ~CDXUTControl();
00364 
00365     virtual HRESULT OnInit() { return S_OK; }
00366     virtual void Refresh();
00367     virtual void Render( IDirect3DDevice9* pd3dDevice, float fElapsedTime ) { };
00368 
00369     // Windows message handler
00370     virtual bool MsgProc( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam ) { return false; }
00371 
00372     virtual bool HandleKeyboard( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam ) { return false; }
00373     virtual bool HandleMouse( UINT uMsg, POINT pt, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam ) { return false; }
00374 
00375     virtual bool CanHaveFocus() { return false; }
00376     virtual void OnFocusIn() { m_bHasFocus = true; }
00377     virtual void OnFocusOut() { m_bHasFocus = false; }
00378     virtual void OnMouseEnter() { m_bMouseOver = true; }
00379     virtual void OnMouseLeave() { m_bMouseOver = false; }
00380     virtual void OnHotkey() {}
00381 
00382     virtual BOOL ContainsPoint( POINT pt ) { return PtInRect( &m_rcBoundingBox, pt ); }
00383 
00384     virtual void SetEnabled( bool bEnabled ) { m_bEnabled = bEnabled; }
00385     virtual bool GetEnabled() { return m_bEnabled; }
00386     virtual void SetVisible( bool bVisible ) { m_bVisible = bVisible; }
00387     virtual bool GetVisible() { return m_bVisible; }
00388 
00389     UINT GetType() const { return m_Type; }
00390 
00391     int  GetID() const { return m_ID; }
00392     void SetID( int ID ) { m_ID = ID; }
00393 
00394     void SetLocation( int x, int y ) { m_x = x; m_y = y; UpdateRects(); }
00395     void SetSize( int width, int height ) { m_width = width; m_height = height; UpdateRects(); }
00396 
00397     void SetHotkey( UINT nHotkey ) { m_nHotkey = nHotkey; }
00398     UINT GetHotkey() { return m_nHotkey; }
00399 
00400     void SetUserData( void *pUserData ) { m_pUserData = pUserData; }
00401     void *GetUserData() const { return m_pUserData; }
00402 
00403     virtual void SetTextColor( D3DCOLOR Color );
00404     CDXUTElement* GetElement( UINT iElement ) { return m_Elements.GetAt( iElement ); }
00405     HRESULT SetElement( UINT iElement, CDXUTElement* pElement);
00406 
00407     bool m_bVisible;                // Shown/hidden flag
00408     bool m_bMouseOver;              // Mouse pointer is above control
00409     bool m_bHasFocus;               // Control has input focus
00410     bool m_bIsDefault;              // Is the default control
00411 
00412     // Size, scale, and positioning members
00413     int m_x, m_y;
00414     int m_width, m_height;
00415 
00416     // These members are set by the container
00417     CDXUTDialog* m_pDialog;    // Parent container
00418     UINT m_Index;              // Index within the control list
00419     
00420     CGrowableArray< CDXUTElement* > m_Elements;  // All display elements
00421 
00422 protected:
00423     virtual void UpdateRects();
00424 
00425     int  m_ID;                 // ID number
00426     DXUT_CONTROL_TYPE m_Type;  // Control type, set once in constructor  
00427     UINT m_nHotkey;            // Virtual key code for this control's hotkey
00428     void *m_pUserData;         // Data associated with this control that is set by user.
00429     
00430     bool m_bEnabled;           // Enabled/disabled flag
00431     
00432     RECT m_rcBoundingBox;      // Rectangle defining the active region of the control
00433 };

00469 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00470 // Button control
00471 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00472 class CDXUTButton : public CDXUTStatic
00473 {
00474 public:
00475     CDXUTButton( CDXUTDialog *pDialog = NULL );
00476 
00477     virtual bool HandleKeyboard( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
00478     virtual bool HandleMouse( UINT uMsg, POINT pt, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
00479     virtual void OnHotkey() { m_pDialog->RequestFocus( this ); m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_BUTTON_CLICKED, true, this ); }
00480     
00481     virtual BOOL ContainsPoint( POINT pt ) { return PtInRect( &m_rcBoundingBox, pt ); }
00482     virtual bool CanHaveFocus() { return (m_bVisible && m_bEnabled); }
00483 
00484     virtual void Render( IDirect3DDevice9* pd3dDevice, float fElapsedTime );
00485 
00486 protected:
00487     bool m_bPressed;
00488 };

00500     virtual bool HandleMouse( UINT uMsg, POINT pt, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
00501     virtual void OnHotkey() { m_pDialog->RequestFocus( this ); SetCheckedInternal( !m_bChecked, true ); }
00502 
00503     virtual BOOL ContainsPoint( POINT pt ); 
00504     virtual void UpdateRects(); 
00505 
00506     virtual void Render( IDirect3DDevice9* pd3dDevice, float fElapsedTime );
00507 
00508     bool GetChecked() { return m_bChecked; }
00509     void SetChecked( bool bChecked ) { SetCheckedInternal( bChecked, false ); }
00510     
00511 protected:
00512     virtual void SetCheckedInternal( bool bChecked, bool bFromInput );
00513 
00514     bool m_bChecked;
00515     RECT m_rcButton;
00516     RECT m_rcText;
00517 };

00542 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00543 // Scrollbar control
00544 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00545 class CDXUTScrollBar : public CDXUTControl
00546 {
00547 public:
00548     CDXUTScrollBar( CDXUTDialog *pDialog = NULL );
00549     virtual ~CDXUTScrollBar();
00550 
00551     virtual bool    HandleKeyboard( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
00552     virtual bool    HandleMouse( UINT uMsg, POINT pt, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
00553 
00554     virtual void Render( IDirect3DDevice9* pd3dDevice, float fElapsedTime );
00555     virtual void    UpdateRects();
00556 
00557     void SetTrackRange( int nStart, int nEnd );
00558     int GetTrackPos() { return m_nPosition; }
00559     void SetTrackPos( int nPosition ) { m_nPosition = nPosition; Cap(); UpdateThumbRect(); }
00560     int GetPageSize() { return m_nPageSize; }
00561     void SetPageSize( int nPageSize ) { m_nPageSize = nPageSize; Cap(); UpdateThumbRect(); }
00562 
00563     void Scroll( int nDelta );    // Scroll by nDelta items (plus or minus)
00564     void ShowItem( int nIndex );  // Ensure that item nIndex is displayed, scroll if necessary
00565 
00566 protected:
00567     // ARROWSTATE indicates the state of the arrow buttons.
00568     // CLEAR            No arrow is down.
00569     // CLICKED_UP       Up arrow is clicked.
00570     // CLICKED_DOWN     Down arrow is clicked.
00571     // HELD_UP          Up arrow is held down for sustained period.
00572     // HELD_DOWN        Down arrow is held down for sustained period.
00573     enum ARROWSTATE { CLEAR, CLICKED_UP, CLICKED_DOWN, HELD_UP, HELD_DOWN };
00574 
00575     void UpdateThumbRect();
00576     void Cap();  // Clips position at boundaries. Ensures it stays within legal range.
00577 
00578     bool m_bShowThumb;
00579     RECT m_rcUpButton;
00580     RECT m_rcDownButton;
00581     RECT m_rcTrack;
00582     RECT m_rcThumb;
00583     int m_nPosition;  // Position of the first displayed item
00584     int m_nPageSize;  // How many items are displayable in one page
00585     int m_nStart;     // First item
00586     int m_nEnd;       // The index after the last item
00587     POINT m_LastMouse;// Last mouse position
00588     ARROWSTATE m_Arrow; // State of the arrows
00589     double m_dArrowTS;  // Timestamp of last arrow event.
00590 };
00591

00648     int m_nSelStart;    // Index of the item where selection starts (for handling multi-selection)
00649     bool m_bDrag;       // Whether the user is dragging the mouse to select
00650 
00651     CGrowableArray< DXUTListBoxItem* > m_Items;

00767 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00768 // CUniBuffer class for the edit control
00769 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00770 class CUniBuffer
00771 {
00772 public:
00773     CUniBuffer( int nInitialSize = 1 );
00774     ~CUniBuffer();
00775 
00776     static void Initialize();
00777     static void Uninitialize();
00778 
00779     int  GetBufferSize() { return m_nBufferSize; }
00780     bool SetBufferSize( int nSize );
00781     int  GetTextSize()  { return lstrlenW( m_pwszBuffer ); }
00782     const WCHAR* GetBuffer() { return m_pwszBuffer; }
00783     const WCHAR& operator[]( int n ) const { return m_pwszBuffer[n]; }
00784     WCHAR& operator[]( int n );
00785     DXUTFontNode* GetFontNode() { return m_pFontNode; }
00786     void SetFontNode( DXUTFontNode *pFontNode ) { m_pFontNode = pFontNode; }
00787     void Clear();
00788 
00789     bool InsertChar( int nIndex, WCHAR wChar ); // Inserts the char at specified index. If nIndex == -1, insert to the end.
00790     bool RemoveChar( int nIndex );  // Removes the char at specified index. If nIndex == -1, remove the last char.
00791     bool InsertString( int nIndex, const WCHAR *pStr, int nCount = -1 );  // Inserts the first nCount characters of the string pStr at specified index.  If nCount == -1, the entire string is inserted. If nIndex == -1, insert to the end.
00792     bool SetText( LPCWSTR wszText );
00793 
00794     // Uniscribe
00795     HRESULT CPtoX( int nCP, BOOL bTrail, int *pX );
00796     HRESULT XtoCP( int nX, int *pCP, int *pnTrail );
00797     void GetPriorItemPos( int nCP, int *pPrior );
00798     void GetNextItemPos( int nCP, int *pPrior );
00799 
00800 private:
00801     HRESULT Analyse();      // Uniscribe -- Analyse() analyses the string in the buffer
00802 
00803     WCHAR* m_pwszBuffer;    // Buffer to hold text
00804     int    m_nBufferSize;   // Size of the buffer allocated, in characters
00805 
00806     // Uniscribe-specific
00807     DXUTFontNode* m_pFontNode;          // Font node for the font that this buffer uses
00808     bool m_bAnalyseRequired;            // True if the string has changed since last analysis.
00809     SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS m_Analysis;  // Analysis for the current string
00810 
00811 private:
00812     // Empty implementation of the Uniscribe API
00813     static HRESULT WINAPI Dummy_ScriptApplyDigitSubstitution( const SCRIPT_DIGITSUBSTITUTE*, SCRIPT_CONTROL*, SCRIPT_STATE* ) { return E_NOTIMPL; }
00814     static HRESULT WINAPI Dummy_ScriptStringAnalyse( HDC, const void *, int, int, int, DWORD, int, SCRIPT_CONTROL*, SCRIPT_STATE*, const int*, SCRIPT_TABDEF*, const BYTE*, SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS* ) { return E_NOTIMPL; }
00815     static HRESULT WINAPI Dummy_ScriptStringCPtoX( SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS, int, BOOL, int* ) { return E_NOTIMPL; }
00816     static HRESULT WINAPI Dummy_ScriptStringXtoCP( SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS, int, int*, int* ) { return E_NOTIMPL; }
00817     static HRESULT WINAPI Dummy_ScriptStringFree( SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS* ) { return E_NOTIMPL; }
00818     static const SCRIPT_LOGATTR* WINAPI Dummy_ScriptString_pLogAttr( SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS ) { return NULL; }
00819     static const int* WINAPI Dummy_ScriptString_pcOutChars( SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS ) { return NULL; }
00820 
00821     // Function pointers
00822     static HRESULT (WINAPI *_ScriptApplyDigitSubstitution)( const SCRIPT_DIGITSUBSTITUTE*, SCRIPT_CONTROL*, SCRIPT_STATE* );
00823     static HRESULT (WINAPI *_ScriptStringAnalyse)( HDC, const void *, int, int, int, DWORD, int, SCRIPT_CONTROL*, SCRIPT_STATE*, const int*, SCRIPT_TABDEF*, const BYTE*, SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS* );
00824     static HRESULT (WINAPI *_ScriptStringCPtoX)( SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS, int, BOOL, int* );

00831

00834 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

00838 {

00844     virtual bool HandleMouse( UINT uMsg, POINT pt, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
00845     virtual bool MsgProc( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam );
00846     virtual void UpdateRects();
00847     virtual bool CanHaveFocus() { return (m_bVisible && m_bEnabled); }
00848     virtual void Render( IDirect3DDevice9* pd3dDevice, float fElapsedTime );
00849     virtual void OnFocusIn();
00850 
00851     void SetText( LPCWSTR wszText, bool bSelected = false );
00852     LPCWSTR GetText() { return m_Buffer.GetBuffer(); }
00853     int GetTextLength() { return m_Buffer.GetTextSize(); }  // Returns text length in chars excluding NULL.
00854     HRESULT GetTextCopy( LPWSTR strDest, UINT bufferCount );
00855     void ClearText();
00856     virtual void SetTextColor( D3DCOLOR Color ) { m_TextColor = Color; }  // Text color
00857     void SetSelectedTextColor( D3DCOLOR Color ) { m_SelTextColor = Color; }  // Selected text color
00858     void SetSelectedBackColor( D3DCOLOR Color ) { m_SelBkColor = Color; }  // Selected background color
00859     void SetCaretColor( D3DCOLOR Color ) { m_CaretColor = Color; }  // Caret color
00860     void SetBorderWidth( int nBorder ) { m_nBorder = nBorder; UpdateRects(); }  // Border of the window
00861     void SetSpacing( int nSpacing ) { m_nSpacing = nSpacing; UpdateRects(); }

00863     void SetTextFloatArray( const float *pNumbers, int nCount );
00864

00870     void PasteFromClipboard();
00871 
00872     CUniBuffer m_Buffer;     // Buffer to hold text
00873     int      m_nBorder;      // Border of the window
00874     int      m_nSpacing;     // Spacing between the text and the edge of border
00875     RECT     m_rcText;       // Bounding rectangle for the text
00876     RECT     m_rcRender[9];  // Convenient rectangles for rendering elements
00877     double   m_dfBlink;      // Caret blink time in milliseconds
00878     double   m_dfLastBlink;  // Last timestamp of caret blink
00879     bool     m_bCaretOn;     // Flag to indicate whether caret is currently visible
00880     int      m_nCaret;       // Caret position, in characters
00881     bool     m_bInsertMode;  // If true, control is in insert mode. Else, overwrite mode.
00882     int      m_nSelStart;    // Starting position of the selection. The caret marks the end.
00883     int      m_nFirstVisible;// First visible character in the edit control
00884     D3DCOLOR m_TextColor;    // Text color
00885     D3DCOLOR m_SelTextColor; // Selected text color
00886     D3DCOLOR m_SelBkColor;   // Selected background color
00887     D3DCOLOR m_CaretColor;   // Caret color
00888 
00889     // Mouse-specific
00890     bool m_bMouseDrag;       // True to indicate drag in progress
00891 
00892     // Static
00893     static bool s_bHideCaret;   // If true, we don't render the caret.
00894 };

01013 
01014     struct CCandList
01015     {
01016         WCHAR awszCandidate[MAX_CANDLIST][256];
01017         CUniBuffer HoriCand; // Candidate list string (for horizontal candidate window)
01018         int   nFirstSelected; // First character position of the selected string in HoriCand
01019         int   nHoriSelectedLen; // Length of the selected string in HoriCand
01020         DWORD dwCount;       // Number of valid entries in the candidate list
01021         DWORD dwSelection;   // Currently selected candidate entry relative to page top
01022         DWORD dwPageSize;
01023         int   nReadingError; // Index of the error character
01024         bool  bShowWindow;   // Whether the candidate list window is visible
01025         RECT  rcCandidate;   // Candidate rectangle computed and filled each time before rendered
01026     };
01027 
01028     struct CInputLocale
01029     {
01030         HKL   m_hKL;            // Keyboard layout
01031         WCHAR m_wszLangAbb[3];  // Language abbreviation
01032         WCHAR m_wszLang[64];    // Localized language name
01033     };
01034 
01035     // Application-wide data
01036     static HINSTANCE s_hDllImm32;         // IMM32 DLL handle
01037     static HINSTANCE s_hDllVer;           // Version DLL handle
01038     static HIMC      s_hImcDef;           // Default input context
01039 
01040     static HKL     s_hklCurrent;          // Current keyboard layout of the process
01041     static bool    s_bVerticalCand;       // Indicates that the candidates are listed vertically
01042     static LPWSTR  s_wszCurrIndicator;    // Points to an indicator string that corresponds to current input locale
01043     static WCHAR   s_aszIndicator[5][3];  // String to draw to indicate current input locale
01044     static bool    s_bInsertOnType;       // Insert the character as soon as a key is pressed (Korean behavior)
01045     static HINSTANCE s_hDllIme;           // Instance handle of the current IME module
01046     static IMESTATE  s_ImeState;          // IME global state
01047     static bool    s_bEnableImeSystem;    // Whether the IME system is active
01048     static POINT   s_ptCompString;        // Composition string position. Updated every frame.
01049     static int     s_nCompCaret;          // Caret position of the composition string
01050     static int     s_nFirstTargetConv;    // Index of the first target converted char in comp string.  If none, -1.
01051     static CUniBuffer s_CompString;       // Buffer to hold the composition string (we fix its length)
01052     static BYTE    s_abCompStringAttr[MAX_COMPSTRING_SIZE];
01053     static DWORD   s_adwCompStringClause[MAX_COMPSTRING_SIZE];
01054     static WCHAR   s_wszReadingString[32];// Used only with horizontal reading window (why?)
01055     static CCandList s_CandList;          // Data relevant to the candidate list
01056     static bool    s_bShowReadingWindow;  // Indicates whether reading window is visible
01057     static bool    s_bHorizontalReading;  // Indicates whether the reading window is vertical or horizontal
01058     static bool    s_bChineseIME;

01068     D3DCOLOR       m_CandidateSelColor;   // Selected candidate string color
01069     D3DCOLOR       m_CandidateSelBkColor; // Selected candidate background color
01070     D3DCOLOR       m_CompColor;           // Composition string color
01071     D3DCOLOR       m_CompWinColor;        // Composition string window color
01072     D3DCOLOR       m_CompCaretColor;      // Composition string caret color
01073     D3DCOLOR       m_CompTargetColor;     // Composition string target converted color
01074     D3DCOLOR       m_CompTargetBkColor;   // Composition string target converted background
01075     D3DCOLOR       m_CompTargetNonColor;  // Composition string target non-converted color
01076     D3DCOLOR       m_CompTargetNonBkColor;// Composition string target non-converted background
01077     D3DCOLOR       m_IndicatorImeColor;   // Indicator text color for IME
01078     D3DCOLOR       m_IndicatorEngColor;   // Indicator text color for English
